docs.text: Quicklook This is the documentation for Quicklook . An easy way to visualize numpy arrays.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This is the documentation for Quicklook . An easy way to visualize numpy arrays.
docs.title: Quicklook

docs.text: Running from command line python3 quicklook [filepath] - Displays an image from file python3 quicklook.py --help - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Command Line

docs.text: python3 quicklook [filepath] - Displays an image from file python3 quicklook.py --help - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Running from command line

docs.text: Usage Import quicklook in python and view a numpy array from quicklook import quicklook quicklook.show(arr) Numpy array example The example array above was generated using static() arr = quicklook.static() Numpy array from file You might want to load an image from file into a numpy array arr = quicklook.load('path/to/image.png')
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Import quicklook in python and view a numpy array from quicklook import quicklook quicklook.show(arr)
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: The example array above was generated using static() arr = quicklook.static()
docs.title: Numpy array example

docs.text: You might want to load an image from file into a numpy array arr = quicklook.load('path/to/image.png')
docs.title: Numpy array from file
